roles.name: Fighter
roles.description: The Fighter takes charge to meet challenges up close. They are weapon masters and martial artists, relying on their physical might to overcome foes.

roles.name: Invoker
roles.description: The Invoker is a battle mage, relying on the force of their ideals. They conjure protective wards, invigorate allies in a pinch, and a smite ennemies with radiance.

roles.name: Ranger
roles.description: The Ranger is an outlander, hunter and skilled navigator, thriving on the fringes of civilizations. They keep faithful pets and have a special bond with beasts.

roles.name: Naturalist
roles.description: The Naturalist cahnnels their connection with nature to manipulate the elements, commune with animals, and even transform themselves into wild beasts.

roles.name: Doctor
roles.description: The Doctor is a magic scientist who tinkers with the forces of life and death. They reverse (or advance) the effects of damage, disease and decay.

roles.name: Spy
roles.description: The spy is a crafty agent of stealth and experts in the use of magical gadgets, chemicals, traps, disguises, and forgeries.

roles.name: Magician
roles.description: The Magician specializes in conjuration and psychic manipulation. From parlor tricks to elaborate deceptions, they are master illusionists, capable of twisting the mind.

roles.name: Wizard
roles.description: The Wizard is a powerful spellcaster with a diverse set of magical abilities. At the height of their power, they can travel to other worlds and transcend their mortal selves.

abilities.name: Counterattack
abilities.description: Quickly turn the tables on an attacker who makes a mistake.

abilities.name: Wild Attack
abilities.description: Strike a foe with reckless power.

abilities.name: Overpower
abilities.description: Put an enemy in a compromised position.

abilities.name: Disarm
abilities.description: Strip a foe of their weapon or take it for yourself.

abilities.name: Duel
abilities.description: Compel a nearby creature to fight you in single combat.

abilities.name: Provoke
abilities.description: Draw the attention of a nearby creature by taunting them.

abilities.name: Intercept
abilities.description: Rush in to interrupt an attack on someone else.

abilities.name: Charge
abilities.description: Violently barrel through anything in your path.

abilities.name: Retreat
abilities.description: Provoke nearby creatures to give your allies cover to withdraw.

abilities.name: Whirlwind
abilities.description: Become a tornado of martial fury.

abilities.name: Summon the Blood
abilities.description: Recite a poem to bolster the spirits of your friends.

abilities.name: Valiant Soliloquy
abilities.description: Give a rousing speech to your allies, inspiring them to overcome the odds.

abilities.name: War Story
abilities.description: Earn extra AP by recounting a battle from your past adventures.

abilities.name: Marshal
abilities.description: Organize the help of your allies to overcome a test of strength.

abilities.name: Bond
abilities.description: Form an unbreakable partnership with one of your party members.

abilities.name: Size Up
abilities.description: Evaluate the capabilities and vulnerabilities of a nearby creature.

abilities.name: Plan
abilities.description: Prepare your party before combat to ambush your enemies.

abilities.name: Recruit
abilities.description: Command a nearby commoner or minion to assist you.

abilities.name: Attendant
abilities.description: Permanently call an NPC Fighter into service as your ally and apprentice.

abilities.name: Technique
abilities.description: Make your body as deadly as common weapons.

abilities.name: Flow
abilities.description: Enter a state of intense focus after rolling a Triumph.

abilities.name: Yawp
abilities.description: Make a show of bravado to frighten nearby creatures.

abilities.name: Focus
abilities.description: You clear your mind, allowing you to surpass your normal limits.

abilities.name: Defy Death
abilities.description: If you would die from an enemyâ€™s attack, you overcome fate to make a last stand.

abilities.name: Limit Break
abilities.description: Achieve a transcendent unity of mind and body to achieve one of three supernatural feats.

abilities.name: Champion
abilities.description: Tales of your heroic deeds have spread widely, unlocking heroic abilities.

abilities.name: Steel Pact
abilities.description: Form a permanent, extraordinary bond with one of your weapons.

abilities.name: Declare
abilities.description: Profess a reason for intervening in a matter, steeling your resolve.

abilities.name: Petition
abilities.description: While regrouping, recite a petition to receive a boon.

abilities.name: Invoke
abilities.description: Leave your worldly body behind to seek answers in a liminal plane of existence.

abilities.name: Vow
abilities.description: Permanently bind yourself in service of an ideal.

abilities.name: Soul Gaze
abilities.description: Peer into the eyes of another creature to sense their ideals and flaws.

abilities.name: Impression
abilities.description: Brush against a creature, feeling its desires.

abilities.name: Evil Eye
abilities.description: Close your eyes and sense the worst thing that ever happened nearby.

abilities.name: Shadowseek
abilities.description: Project yourself into a shadow plane to seek the location of a creature or object anywhere in the omniverse.

abilities.name: Inspire
abilities.description: Recite a meaningful statement, inspiring an NPC to live up to their ideal.

abilities.name: Compel Truth
abilities.description: Grip the mind of a nearby creature, forcing it to tell the truth.

abilities.name: Forgive
abilities.description: Place a forgiving hand on a creature, relieving their conscience of guilt for a past transgression.

abilities.name: Liberate
abilities.description: Channel the weight of your devotion to alleviate an NPC of a character flaw.

abilities.name: Fiery Avenger
abilities.description: Speak a phrase of power, igniting your weapon in magical flame.

abilities.name: Thunderous Word
abilities.description: Speak a word of power that releases a thunderous shockwave.

abilities.name: Lawbringer
abilities.description: Raise your hand into the sky and summon a deadly spectral warhammer.

abilities.name: Smite
abilities.description: Condemn a creature, engulfing it in radiant flame.

abilities.name: Blazing Avenger
abilities.description: Permanently enchant a weapon, imbuing it with incredible power.

abilities.name: Shield
abilities.description: Summon a magical shield that blocks damage.

abilities.name: Sigil
abilities.description: Draw a magic sigil that affects nearby creatures in various ways.

abilities.name: Rebuke
abilities.description: Issue a word of power to an attacker, knocking them backward.

abilities.name: Oblation
abilities.description: Place your hands on a creature and utter a loving phrase, restoring their hit points.

abilities.name: Befizzle
abilities.description: Curse a creature, rendering it unable to use magic.

abilities.name: Wraith
abilities.description: Enter an ethereal form when at 0 HP.

abilities.name: Sacrifice
abilities.description: Bring a creature back from the dead, at a cost to your own soul.

abilities.name: Prophecy
abilities.description: Glimpse a creatureâ€™s fate, shaping its future.

abilities.name: Eternity Gate
abilities.description: Project yourself past all realities into the beyond to seek and find a single truth.

abilities.name: Commune
abilities.description: Invent a local saying to charm information out of a commoner.

abilities.name: Folk Song
abilities.description: Sing a song that kindles bright, somber, or proud feelings in NPCs nearby.

abilities.name: Speak Myth
abilities.description: Appeal to a local myth to gain the favor of a commoner and receive a favor.

abilities.name: Remedy
abilities.description: Scavenge your area to find a plant-based remedy for an ailment.

abilities.name: Shroud
abilities.description: Entreat nearby flora to provide protection for the party.

abilities.name: Signal
abilities.description: Summon the help of a fellow Ranger.

abilities.name: Ritual
abilities.description: Scavenge for a magic edible that gives you supernatural insight.

abilities.name: Read the Winds
abilities.description: Sense weather patterns, and can predict the weather in the days ahead.

abilities.name: Navigate
abilities.description: Canâ€™t get lost in wilderness, and you can find a special natural reprieve in times of need.

abilities.name: Delve
abilities.description: Sense the general layout of the next three areas in an underground structure.

abilities.name: Speak with Trees
abilities.description: Touch a tree trunk, connecting yourself to the forest. The trees come to your aid.

abilities.name: Track
abilities.description: Pick up on tracks left nearby and identify the type of creature that left them.

abilities.name: Farshot
abilities.description: Sharpen your senses to make a ranged attack on a far away target.

abilities.name: Deadeye
abilities.description: When you roll a Triumph on a ranged attack, you can neutralize an enemyâ€™s body part.

abilities.name: Stalk
abilities.description: You and your party can stalk tracked prey without it noticing you, setting up an ambush.

abilities.name: Nemesis
abilities.description: Mark a specific creature you have met before as your nemesis, giving you an advantage against it.

abilities.name: Speak with Animal
abilities.description: Form a bond with an animal, allowing you to interpret its thoughts and feelings.

abilities.name: Animal Partner
abilities.description: Bond with a nearby animal who becomes your companion and follows your instructions.

abilities.name: Courier
abilities.description: Recruit a nearby animal and send it on a mission to deliver an item.

abilities.name: Pair Bond
abilities.description: Develop a telepathic bond with your animal partner, allowing you to enter a trance and take over its body.

abilities.name: Whisper on the Wind
abilities.description: Whisper a message carried by the wind, summoning a flying animal to come to your aid.

abilities.name: Wild Celebrity
abilities.description: Wild animals everywhere now sense you as an ally and will not attack you.

abilities.name: Slayer
abilities.description: Devastate a group of minions in an impressive acrobatic fashion, reducing their numbers by half.

abilities.name: Friend of the Land
abilities.description: Become the friend of a wilderness region, gaining the control of a natural fortress.

abilities.name: Animal Form
abilities.description: Take the form of a wild animal, adopting its shape, senses, and range of motion.

abilities.name: Gills
abilities.description: Enchant nearby creatures, allowing them to breathe underwater.

abilities.name: Steelsprout
abilities.description: Turn a nearby metal object into a weave of delicate plants.

abilities.name: Petrify
abilities.description: Turn the surface of a creature to stone, or encase your own body with a protective shell.

abilities.name: Shapeshift
abilities.description: A superior version of your Animal Form spell that allows you to become a more powerful animal.

abilities.name: Thorn
abilities.description: Conjure a poisonous thorn and shoot it toward a nearby target.

abilities.name: Wild Font
abilities.description: Touch a container holding food, water, or oil, causing it to spill an excess of its contents.

abilities.name: Evening Star
abilities.description: Summon a wisp of light in the sky, casting daylight on a huge area.

abilities.name: Aurora
abilities.description: Conjure a dazzling prismatic aurora in the sky that dazzles creatures up to a kilometer away.

abilities.name: Echoes of Creation
abilities.description: Summon a coterie of magical wisps that restore the hit points of all creatures in your scene.

abilities.name: Freeze
abilities.description: Blow cool air, creating freezing winds that swirl around a nearby target.

abilities.name: Burn
abilities.description: Blow hot air, creating scorching winds that can ignite a target in flame nearby.

abilities.name: Shock
abilities.description: Call down a bolt of lightning from the sky to strike a target you can see.

abilities.name: Fireball
abilities.description: Shape an orb of fire and send it streaking toward a target, where it creates a devastating explosion.

abilities.name: Cloudcall
abilities.description: Create a thick fog that rapidly expands around you, concealing the area.

abilities.name: Vortex
abilities.description: Create a howling vortex in a body of liquid nearby that can suck in objects and creatures.

abilities.name: Gale
abilities.description: Create a ferocious windstorm that kicks up dust and small objects and obscures vision.

abilities.name: Riverfury
abilities.description: Whisper a magical incantation to a nearby river, calling forth a torrent of water from upstream.

abilities.name: Stormcall
abilities.description: Produce a terrifying storm whose effects you can control while it is active.

abilities.name: Wild Aspect
abilities.description: Harness the aspect of one of three wild creatures, gaining heightened physical capabilities.

abilities.name: Prey Sense
abilities.description: Sharpen your senses and can feel a subtle signal when danger is near.

abilities.name: Nature's Watch
abilities.description: Extend your senses far beyond your normal capabilities, allowing you to detect the hidden and unreal.

abilities.name: Command Nature
abilities.description: Recite a brief poem to the plants around you, causing them to produce an effect.

abilities.name: Memories of Stone
abilities.description: Channel the ancient wisdom of a stone monument, learning important information about your world.

abilities.name: Shift Season
abilities.description: Manipulate the elements to change the current season everywhere within one kilometer of you.

abilities.name: Nature's Wrath
abilities.description: Channel elemental fury, creating one of three natural disasters with an enormous impact on the environment.

abilities.name: Wild Evolution
abilities.description: Your physical essence becomes permanently intertwined with a chosen animalâ€™s form, allowing you to shapeshift at will.

abilities.name: To Dust
abilities.description: Sacrifice yourself to become the seed for a new world, creating life across a planet.

abilities.name: World Wish
abilities.description: Return a crafted object to nature, instantly reducing it to dust.

abilities.name: Mend
abilities.description: Gently touch a creature, immediately restoring hit points and mending minor wounds.

abilities.name: Relieve
abilities.description: Say something comforting, relieving a creature of anxiety, pain, and discomfort.

abilities.name: Heal
abilities.description: Embrace a creature, restoring all of its hit points and curing it of short-term impairments.

abilities.name: Restore
abilities.description: Touch a creature, completely restoring it to its normal state.

abilities.name: Sleep
abilities.description: Whisper a brief lullaby, putting any number of nearby commoners to sleep for an hour.

abilities.name: Calcify
abilities.description: Touch a creature, causing its surface to harden and resist damage.

abilities.name: Feign Death
abilities.description: Place nearby creatures in suspended animation for up to an hour.

abilities.name: Reshape
abilities.description: Reshape the facial appearance of a creature, making them look older, younger, or like a completely different person.

abilities.name: Lifelink
abilities.description: Entwine the life-force of two creatures, tying their fates together.

abilities.name: DeathSense
abilities.description: Sense whether any spirit creatures are nearby, and can extend your vision to see them.

abilities.name: Commune with the Dead
abilities.description: Reach beyond the living to speak to the dead nearby.

abilities.name: Reanimate
abilities.description: Animate a nearby corpse or skeleton, making it your minion.

abilities.name: Reinstate the Dead
abilities.description: Touch a living creature and make it the host for a nearby spirit creature.

abilities.name: Corrupt
abilities.description: Grip a creature and create a necrotizing wound in its flesh.

abilities.name: Nox
abilities.description: Give a creature a combination of deleterious effects for the next hour.

abilities.name: Afflict
abilities.description: Curse a creature with an affliction that lasts for up to one month.

abilities.name: Wither
abilities.description: Cause a creatureâ€™s body to wither, giving them the experience of advanced age without changing their lifespan.

abilities.name: Heartkill
abilities.description: Curse the heart of a creature, causing it to explode, or turning it into a time bomb.

abilities.name: Modulate
abilities.description: Alter the nature and intensity of a creatureâ€™s physical sensations for up to an hour.

abilities.name: Shape Senses
abilities.description: Manipulate a creatureâ€™s perception of the world for up to a day.

abilities.name: False Sense
abilities.description: Cause a creature to perceive a specific thing or a category of things falsely.

abilities.name: Forget
abilities.description: Touch a creature, erasing its memory for the previous monthâ€¦ or beyond.

abilities.name: Examine the Dead
abilities.description: Evaluate a corpse to diagnose its cause of death.

abilities.name: Diagnose
abilities.description: Touch a creature to discover its mysterious affliction.

abilities.name: Curious Case
abilities.description: Examine a scene for familiar clues.

abilities.name: Genesis Command
abilities.description: Reverse or accelerate a creatureâ€™s development, like reverting an adult into a child.

abilities.name: Banish
abilities.description: Banish a spirit creature to a random shadow plane.

abilities.name: Eternal Slumber
abilities.description: Place a creature into a permanent and peaceful sleep.

abilities.name: The Bitter Gift
abilities.description: Bestow a creature with self-awareness, turning it into a person like you.

abilities.name: Cosmopolitan
abilities.description: Invent a local mannerism to fool commoners about your identity.

abilities.name: Silver Tongue
abilities.description: Use quick thinking and charm to evade suspicion.

abilities.name: Don't You Know Who I Am?
abilities.description: Enlist your party members to establish a fantastical ruse about your identity.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.description: Make a quick attack on a foe who is distracted.

abilities.name: Poison
abilities.description: Combine basic goods from a general store to create one of five poisons.

abilities.name: Death Hand
abilities.description: A magic, single-shot hand cannon that uses a silent magic charge to shoot a slug.

abilities.name: Bounty
abilities.description: Enlist bounty hunters to pursue and capture or kill a marked target.

abilities.name: Strap
abilities.description: Conceal up to two weapons in your clothing without being noticed.

abilities.name: Disguise
abilities.description: Use found objects nearby to create a convincing disguise.

abilities.name: Blink Pack
abilities.description: A magical messenger pack with a hidden switch that conceals items.

abilities.name: Needful Hilt
abilities.description: A magic hilt that can morph into a weapon that you imagine when needed.

abilities.name: Shadow
abilities.description: A magic cape that makes everything but your shadow invisible.

abilities.name: Tracker
abilities.description: A magic compass and tag that allows you to track something you put the tag on.

abilities.name: Spyglasses
abilities.description: Magic eyeglasses that let you see in the dark and can be upgraded with additional capabilities.

abilities.name: Cloner
abilities.description: A magic amulet that allows you to eavesdrop on a communications device.

abilities.name: Seeker
abilities.description: A levitating orb that can scout adjacent rooms for you.

abilities.name: Dossier
abilities.description: A magic book that you can use to copy documents.

abilities.name: Mimic
abilities.description: A magic pen that guides your hand to create forgeries.

abilities.name: Listener
abilities.description: A magic gem that can be activated to record sounds nearby.

abilities.name: Crypto
abilities.description: A magic ring that can translate languages and decode secret messages.

abilities.name: Feather Hook
abilities.description: A magical grappling hook that gently glides itself upward like a balloon.

abilities.name: Bricolage
abilities.description: Improvise one of four useful devices using everyday objects nearby.

abilities.name: Needful Key
abilities.description: A magic key that can morph to fit a lock.

abilities.name: Blueprint
abilities.description: A magic folio that can reveal the floorplan of a building when pressed on one of its walls.

abilities.name: Persona
abilities.description: Carefully prepare a convincing alternate identity. You can create the persona of a commoner, an officer, or an aristocrat.

abilities.name: Shadow Cutter
abilities.description: A wearable magic bracelet that can be stretched to create a hole in solid objects.

abilities.name: The Artifice
abilities.description: A small mask that projects an illusion, transforming your image and voice.

abilities.name: Nightcrawler
abilities.description: Infiltrate a personâ€™s office, encampment, or home to discover sensitive information about them.

abilities.name: Magic Tricks
abilities.description: Produce a tiny magical effect to surprise, delight, or confuse those around you.

abilities.name: Mesmerize
abilities.description: Dazzle a nearby creature with an optical illusion.

abilities.name: Overthere
abilities.description: Make a suggestive gesture, redirecting a hostile creatureâ€™s attention.

abilities.name: Mirage
abilities.description: Conjure a major illusion that can be programmed with looping mechanics.

abilities.name: Invisibility
abilities.description: Make a creature or object invisible.

abilities.name: Splitting Image
abilities.description: Create illusory duplicates to confuse others.

abilities.name: Phantom Menace
abilities.description: Create an illusion of an incredibly annoying creature.

abilities.name: Illusory Creature
abilities.description: Design and conjure an illusory creature.

abilities.name: Magic Eye
abilities.description: Briefly gain the ability to see beyond physical reality.

abilities.name: Whisper
abilities.description: Telepathically send a message to a nearby creature, or open a link with them for a conversation.

abilities.name: Message
abilities.description: Open a telepathic communication link with a creature, even if you donâ€™t know where they are.

abilities.name: Interpret
abilities.description: Enter the mind of a nearby creature and learn their language.

abilities.name: Insight
abilities.description: Gaze into the mind of a creature, learning their most prominent intention.

abilities.name: Little Bird
abilities.description: Summon an illusory bird that keeps watch over an area.

abilities.name: Helen's Fantastic Feast
abilities.description: Summon an elaborate feast that restores the hit points of your guests.

abilities.name: Monitor
abilities.description: Summon a small illusory servant that you can direct to scout ahead of you.

abilities.name: Shadow Haven
abilities.description: Create a secret dwelling in a shadow plane that only you and your friends can access.

abilities.name: Bamboozle
abilities.description: Make a creature mildly confused about a specific subject.

abilities.name: Wren's Delightful Dream
abilities.description: Give a creature a deeply comforting dream that makes them feel beloved and forgiving.

abilities.name: Perky Profanation
abilities.description: Curse a nearby creature to behave absurdly.

abilities.name: Fear
abilities.description: Breach the mind of a creature to haunt them with their worst fear.

abilities.name: Scintillate
abilities.description: Launch a streaking bolt of sparks to harm an enemy or create a harmless firework.

abilities.name: Bedazzle
abilities.description: Summon prismatic bolts that can impale and dazzle enemies.

abilities.name: Loosen
abilities.description: Create a cascading wave of magic mischief that loosens things that are fastened or tightened.

abilities.name: Chaos Ball
abilities.description: Summon a small elastic ball that bounces chaotically, shattering small and fragile objects.

abilities.name: Peerless Pilot
abilities.description: Conjure a fantastic hot air balloon from another dimension.

abilities.name: Control
abilities.description: Dominate the mind of a nearby creature, taking complete control of them.

abilities.name: Perfect Gift
abilities.description: Glimpse the mind of a creature to summon an emotionally priceless gift for them.

abilities.name: Invasion
abilities.description: Enter the dream of a creature to implant an idea in their mind.

abilities.name: Magic Strike
abilities.description: Shoot a shimmering missile of force from your wand or staff.

abilities.name: Kindle
abilities.description: Rub your hands together, igniting a target on fire.

abilities.name: Clap
abilities.description: Create a thunderous wave of force by clapping your hands.

abilities.name: Telekinesis
abilities.description: Move a nearby creature or object using only your mind.

abilities.name: Last Light
abilities.description: Channel a blinding beam of light at a target that ignites flammable objects and can melt steel.

abilities.name: Familiar
abilities.description: Summon a tiny spectral creature who becomes your ally.

abilities.name: Pegasus Cloak
abilities.description: Bestow yourself and nearby creatures with an illusory cloak that allows them to levitate.

abilities.name: Force Field
abilities.description: Create a paper-thin wall of force that can stop objects from passing through.

abilities.name: Conjure
abilities.description: Imagine an object, causing it to appear nearby.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Vanish and reappear somewhere nearby.

abilities.name: Gate
abilities.description: Teleport back to a special place you have bound yourself to.

abilities.name: Portal
abilities.description: Conjure a series of portals that are linked to one another.

abilities.name: Dark Door
abilities.description: Knock on a door, making it a temporary portal to a shadow plane.

abilities.name: Teleport
abilities.description: Snap your fingers, teleporting to any place you choose.

abilities.name: No
abilities.description: Neutralize a spell that another creature is casting.

abilities.name: Reflect
abilities.description: Produce a counterspell that reflects a spell another creature is casting.

abilities.name: Enscroll
abilities.description: Create a Spell Scroll that contains a spell you know.

abilities.name: Spellsteal
abilities.description: Glimpse a creatureâ€™s mind to learn a spell you have observed them casting.

abilities.name: Sense Magic
abilities.description: Get a tingling feeling in your bones when youâ€™re near magic, and discern its nature.

abilities.name: Aura's Silvery Broadcast
abilities.description: Broadcast a message up to 20 words in length to every creature within one kilometer.

abilities.name: Scry
abilities.description: Flash forward in time to glimpse your actions in the near future.

abilities.name: See
abilities.description: See through all magical deceptions for the next hour.

abilities.name: Find
abilities.description: Discover the location of an object you have held before, and teleport it to your location.

abilities.name: Speak
abilities.description: Speak silently into the mind of a nearby creature.

abilities.name: Pinch
abilities.description: Briefly imbue your fingers with supernatural strength.

abilities.name: Stretch
abilities.description: Enlarge or shrink a nearby creature or object by up to twice or half its size.

abilities.name: Undo
abilities.description: Speak a word of power, reversing the fate of a nearby object.

abilities.name: Rift
abilities.description: Summon a magnificent gateway that contains a portal to The Rift.

abilities.name: Transcendence
abilities.description: Embark on an incredible quest for knowledge that expands your consciousness far beyond yourself.

abilities.name: Planecraft
abilities.description: Conjure a shadow plane and fill it with anything you can imagine.

abilities.name: Create
abilities.description: Tap raw magic, converting its energy into a perfectly-crafted object that is real in every way.

treasures.name: Albatross Pendant
treasures.description: A magic communication device that delivers headlines from the Albatross Press.

treasures.name: Archive
treasures.description: A talking crystal ball that is programmed to recall information stored inside.

treasures.name: Atlas Incognito
treasures.description: A book of 10 magic stamps that reveals interesting local information.

treasures.name: Blink Blade
treasures.description: A magic sword that can teleport back to its user's hand.

treasures.name: Brell's Boat in a Box
treasures.description: A small wooden box that can expand into a real, working sloop.

treasures.name: Brell's Charismatic Couture
treasures.description: A line of magical shapeshifting garments that automatically find a perfect fit for their wearer.

treasures.name: Brell's Limitless Ledger
treasures.description: A magical networked codex that duplicates entries from linked journals.

treasures.name: Brell's Tent in a Tin
treasures.description: A magic tin canister that can deploy a large tent.

treasures.name: Dim Grimoire
treasures.description: A magic notebook that's risky to read, but can provide great benefits.

treasures.name: Discretion
treasures.description: A magic scabbard that can make weapons appear invisible.

treasures.name: Field Monitor
treasures.description: A magic map that can respond to questions and provide useful information.

treasures.name: Friend Flute
treasures.description: A magic whistle that knows who your friends are.

treasures.name: Glitter Bomb
treasures.description: A pouch of magic glitter that dispels invisibility.

treasures.name: Goat Simulator
treasures.description: A magic stuffed toy goat that turns into a life-sized illusory goat.

treasures.name: Healing Potion
treasures.description: A potion that heals you.

treasures.name: Kiln Gauze
treasures.description: A container of magic gauze used to repair broken metal weapons.

treasures.name: Light Trap
treasures.description: A magic glass orb used like a camera.

treasures.name: Lying Lyre
treasures.description: A magic lyre that guides its user's hands to produce a beautiful song.

treasures.name: Magic Potion
treasures.description: A vial filled with magic liquid that has unpredictable effects.

treasures.name: Mischievous Marbles
treasures.description: A bag of marbles that seeks out creatures to trip.

treasures.name: Not a Pipe
treasures.description: This is a pipe that, when smoked, creates a thick magical fog.

treasures.name: Permanent Solution
treasures.description: A small dropper filled with magic liquid that can permanently bond two things together.

treasures.name: Portable Potent Potable Probe
treasures.description: A small box with a magic dish used to detect poison.

treasures.name: Quiplasher
treasures.description: A sentient magic whip that loves witty one-liners.

treasures.name: Ramification
treasures.description: A magic battering ram that can shatter wooden doors.

treasures.name: Registrar
treasures.description: A magic book that automatically senses and records the most commonly-used name of a creature that passes nearby.

treasures.name: Repeater
treasures.description: A compact magic crossbow.

treasures.name: Silvery Horn
treasures.description: An enchanted horn that can send messages far and wide.

treasures.name: Skycaller Amulets
treasures.description: Pairs of magic amulets that allow their owners to communicate with each other.

treasures.name: The Catcher
treasures.description: A heavy metal gauntlet that allows the wearer to prevent weapon attacks.

treasures.name: The Howdy Doodat
treasures.description: A magic candle that detects illusions.

treasures.name: The Lagniappe
treasures.description: A weapon with a little extra damage.

treasures.name: The Left-Handed Smoke Shifter
treasures.description: A metal rod that sends the bearer on an impossible quest.

treasures.name: The Sure Shot
treasures.description: A magic bow that guides its user's hand.

treasures.name: Tricky Ticket
treasures.description: Magic tickets that can transform into forgeries.

treasures.name: Untamed Magic Broom
treasures.description: A flying broom with its own agenda.

treasures.name: The True Witness
treasures.description: A set of linked magic glasses that share perspectives.

treasures.name: Wraithfire Bomb
treasures.description: A dark crystal orb that explodes.

treasures.name: Abdellahi's Scepter
treasures.description: A magic scepter that casts a chilling spell.

treasures.name: Abyssal Brand
treasures.description: An edged weapon forged by a conniving demon.

treasures.name: Accursed Band
treasures.description: A translucent magic bracelet that can detect spirits.

treasures.name: Big Belt of Strong Strength
treasures.description: An unusually large belt that makes you feel unusually strong.

treasures.name: Bonebreaker
treasures.description: A giant hammer imbued with magic force that accelerates the weapon as it is swung.

treasures.name: Chaos Pearls
treasures.description: A bag of luminescent magic pearls that explode with force.

treasures.name: Dawnbringer
treasures.description: A greathammer imbued with radiant light.

treasures.name: Death Adder
treasures.description: A small magic tally counter that senses nearby deaths.

treasures.name: Defiance
treasures.description: A silvered short blade that grants the wielder immunity against mind magic.

treasures.name: Draconis
treasures.description: A longsword forged in the flame of a dragon's breath.

treasures.name: Dress of Many Pockets
treasures.description: A magic dress that deceptively appears to have no pockets, yet has many.

treasures.name: Gideon's Shroud
treasures.description: A cloak that makes the wearer undetectable by magic.

treasures.name: Lichblade
treasures.description: The weapon of a banished lich that casts a malevolent aura.

treasures.name: Masterwork
treasures.description: A weapon of incredible quality that still bears its maker's mark.

treasures.name: Needful Gift Box
treasures.description: A small wooden box that can produce an object of value.

treasures.name: Perspicacious Pot
treasures.description: A magic pot that can create a recipe.

treasures.name: Portal Chalk
treasures.description: A stick of chalk that can open a portal.

treasures.name: Professor Prim's Mind Exploder
treasures.description: A magic consumable that bestows a new ability.

treasures.name: Scintillating Wand
treasures.description: A magic wand that fills the wielder with mischievous thoughts.

treasures.name: Scrying Sphere
treasures.description: A magic crystal ball that gives the user a glimpse at the future.

treasures.name: Scion
treasures.description: A magic pincushion that can detect family relations.

treasures.name: Serpentine Staff
treasures.description: A snakewood staff that can transform into a viper.

treasures.name: Spell Scroll
treasures.description: A magic scroll enchanted with a spell.

treasures.name: Spirit Trap
treasures.description: A crystal orb that attracts and traps spirit creatures nearby.

treasures.name: The Bouncer
treasures.description: A magic buckler that turns the table on attackers.

treasures.name: The Compensator
treasures.description: A broadsword with an envy problem.

treasures.name: The Eager Edge
treasures.description: A sentient magic sword that loves to be used.

treasures.name: The Miracle Sponge
treasures.description: A sponge with almost no limit to its thirst.

treasures.name: A Magician's Key
treasures.description: An obsidian skeleton key that creates a private plane.

treasures.name: Ancient Ranger's Pouch
treasures.description: A pouch filled with seeds that grow into sentient tree creatures.

treasures.name: Bane
treasures.description: A magical dagger that tries to charm nearby creatures.

treasures.name: Blood Pact
treasures.description: A sentient blade that curses whoever picks it up to feel an unquenchable bloodthirst.

treasures.name: Cloak of a Hundred Billion Stars
treasures.description: A magic cloak that allows an Invoker to commune with the stars.

treasures.name: Conway's Comrades
treasures.description: A set of magic toy figurines that can come alive to do battle.

treasures.name: Cosmic Purse
treasures.description: A magic bag that can hold an unlimited number of items.

treasures.name: Creighton's Fascinators
treasures.description: A pair of tall black boots that cast an aura of leadership.

treasures.name: Echo
treasures.description: A ring that duplicates spells and reflects them.

treasures.name: Fable
treasures.description: A weapon handed down through generations that records the deeds of its wielder.

treasures.name: Guile
treasures.description: A cameo brooch that can create an illusory visage.

treasures.name: Gungrox's Coin
treasures.description: A smooth platinum coin that randomizes a player's role.

treasures.name: Harmony
treasures.description: A weathered wooden lute that seeks music through the omniverse.

treasures.name: Harper's Haven
treasures.description: A small stone figurine with world-shaking power.

treasures.name: June's Blanket
treasures.description: A patchwork blanket that offers love and comfort.

treasures.name: Lorelai's Wand
treasures.description: A magic wand that imbues the wielder with incredible power.

treasures.name: Loren's Luminous Starglass
treasures.description: A magic telescope that carries its wielder through the stars.

treasures.name: Multivious Map
treasures.description: A sentient map of the stars that loves to pontificate about possibility.

treasures.name: Nightmare
treasures.description: A greatsword that gives walking nightmares.

treasures.name: Prismatic Circlet
treasures.description: A crystal crown that projects a major illusion.

treasures.name: Resplendent Plate
treasures.description: An indomitable breastplate that makes the wearer resistant to attacks.

treasures.name: Rebellion
treasures.description: An ancient bronze shield that lights the fires of independence.

treasures.name: Shadow
treasures.description: A magic shortblade forged by a malevolent god that reaps souls.

treasures.name: The Cosmic Cruiser
treasures.description: A magic starship that can travel through space and the omniverse.

treasures.name: The Toll
treasures.description: An iridescent coin that offers eternal paradise.

treasures.name: Unity
treasures.description: A magic pin allowing the wearer to comprehend languages.

treasures.name: Vol
treasures.description: A magic spear that can become a bolt of lightning.

treasures.name: Conservator's Ring
treasures.description: An unimaginably powerful ring that can consume universes.

treasures.name: Cosmic Forge
treasures.description: An obsidian ring that allows the bearer to conjure any object into existence.

treasures.name: Dubbin's Dire Die
treasures.description: A 20-sided die that bends the fate of nearby creatures.

treasures.name: It Whispers to You
treasures.description: A humble ring that bestows a terrible and cursed power.

treasures.name: The Hand
treasures.description: A pocketwatch that can travel through time.

treasures.name: Wish Heart
treasures.description: A magic locket that turns wishes into reality.

treasures.name: Lockpicks
treasures.description: A set of 5 lockpicks that can be used to try to bypass doors and other things with simple locks

treasures.name: Magic Rope
treasures.description: A 50-feet rope that can automitacally coil itself. It can also shrink to the size of a spool of yarn for easy carrying, and expand back to its normal size on its owner's command.

treasures.name: Magic Flask
treasures.description: A magic flask that automatically replenishes itself with spirit of your choice. (Choose once.)

treasures.name: Magic Candle
treasures.description: A powerful candle that can light itself and snuff itself out on its owner's command. It drips wax but never seems to lose any.
